description: BEAUTIFUL TOWNHOUSE IN DAGANZO! Located in a quiet area of the town, distributed over three floors as follows: In the main room, spacious and bright living room with access to the garden. This one, with a paved part, natural grass and provided with an awning Large kitchen completely renovated, with high and low furniture and basic appliances. The toilet, also renovated, will serve the rooms on this floor. On the upper floor, three bedrooms, all with built-in wardrobes. The main one, with an en-suite bathroom and exterior window. In addition to another bathroom with a shower for the rest of the rooms. The attic, an open space, with closets under the roof, to give it the use and enjoyment that you like best. Built on a 150 m² plot, where we even find at the entrance an American garage with a beautiful wooden pergola and automatic door. Daganzo is a municipality in the east of the community of Madrid with excellent communication with NII, R2, M50 and A1, located 10 minutes from Madrid-Adolfo Suárez airport and 30 minutes from Plaza de Castilla. Don't hesitate! Call us without obligation.

WE DO NOT CHARGE FEES TO THE PURCHASING PARTY Nice semi-detached house of 132 m², in one of the best areas of Daganzo. On the ground floor we find the entrance, glazed, with an armored door that gives access to the hall, a cozy living room with access to a small garden; The fully furnished kitchen with patio, has main appliances (oven hood and ceramic hob) and boiler in perfect condition. This floor also has a courtesy toilet. The house has a garden in the front, which, although it is not located in the same house, is a beautiful space for the whole family to enjoy just a few meters away. First floor: Access to this floor through the comfortable staircase with a large window that provides us with a lot of light leads us to the 3 bedrooms, all of them in good condition, with built-in wardrobes and very bright. On this floor we also have a complete bathroom with a shower that serves the bedrooms. Second floor: The attic is semi built. It is a wide space with a Velux type window. This room is perfect for storage or in the future as an additional room, games room, office, etc. The house has wooden floors and stoneware, wooden doors, gotelé type paint, Climalit aluminum windows, awning on the living room window and individual heating. In the same urbanization it has an underground community parking space. Daganzo is located in one of the best areas of the Corredor del Henares, with public transport, schools, a medical center, leisure areas and all the services at your fingertips. Just 15 minutes from Adolfo Suarez Madrid Barajas Airport and excellent communication with N-II-R2-M50 and A-1. Do not miss this opportunity, call us and we will inform you of all the details. The sales prices do not include legal taxes or deed expenses.

Incredible semi-detached house in one of the best areas of Daganzo. 251m² distributed over 3 floors with 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 1 toilet and 96m² of patio with garden. Community area with swimming pools. It has the following distribution: entrance porch with the possibility of making a woodshed, hall with built-in wardrobe and access to a 24m² garage. Fully furnished kitchen equipped with basic appliances, bright 30m² living room with fireplace and access to the sunny and large 96² patio. We have a toilet on this floor. On the upper floor there are the 4 bedrooms, all with a built-in wardrobe. The main one is a suite with a bathroom and a 14m² terrace in the bedroom itself. Another of them also has access to a 4m² terrace. Another full bathroom with shower and window. Fully equipped attic and two different rooms: one with a 10m² storage room and another with a 25m² living room (with the possibility of a bathroom) and access to a 28m² solarium/terrace. Qualities: Heating throughout the house, drop paint, marble, stoneware and parquet floors. Oak doors, white aluminum windows with Climalit. Community area with swimming pool for adults and another for the little ones. Located very close to the entrance of Daganzo, greatly facilitating communication with the main roads and next to local businesses, supermarkets, parks, schools, institutes and public transport. Don't miss this opportunity and come see it or call us for more information.

WE DO NOT CHARGE FEES TO THE BUYING PARTY Don't miss the opportunity to live in the heart of Daganzo! This two-story house with a basement is located in the center of town, next to the town hall. It has a total area of 218m², this property has large spaces and an excellent distribution. Upon entering the house, you will find a large entrance hall that will take you to the spacious living room in two rooms, with windows facing the east and west, which makes it very bright. In addition, it has a fireplace in the 24m² living room and a dining area of approximately 12m². On the ground floor, you will also find a fitted kitchen with access to a 30m² patio facing west, a large full bathroom with window and shower, and the possibility of making an additional bedroom with independent access and window. On the first floor, there are three double bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and Velux windows. The master bedroom has 19m² and two full bathrooms with windows, one with a shower and the other with a bathtub. The basement, with an area of 45m², is ideal for use as a cellar or storage area. The property has individual oil heating, a relatively new tank and boiler, and bars on the ground floor. Don't miss the opportunity to live in a house in perfect condition in an unbeatable location! The sales prices do not include legal taxes or deed expenses.

The beginning of your new life can start today with your new home! We have for sale this fantastic townhouse in Daganzo de Arriba, (Madrid) with a built area of 138 square meters. The house consists of 4 bedrooms and a fifth room, currently used as a workspace, 3 full bathrooms with bathtub, and 1 guest toilet. It is in excellent condition. Ready to move in! It is located in the "Las Moreras" urbanization, a private development in the heart of the town, with a communal garden and swimming pool. Entering the house on the ground floor, there is a front patio with enough space to park a vehicle (surface parking). The reinforced front door gives us access to the house, where we find the fully fitted kitchen with some appliances included in the sale. A spacious living room with two separate areas and a fireplace, where we can enjoy a warm atmosphere during the cold winter days. From the living room, we can also access the back patio, where we can enjoy the warmer days. A guest toilet is the last room on this ground floor of the house. Going up a comfortable marble staircase, we reach the first floor where we find the sleeping area. It consists of 3 bedrooms, one of them being the master suite, which includes a complete bathroom and an open dressing area. On the same floor, there is another full bathroom with bathtub that will be shared by the other 2 bedrooms. Finally, on the second floor of the house, we have an attic area where we find a 4th bedroom, also a suite, a complete bathroom with bathtub, and an additional room that is used as an office or work area. We can also enjoy a small terrace with views of the development. Exterior aluminum carpentry and window grills on the ground floor. Interior wood carpentry. Herringbone parquet floors on the ground and first floors, and ceramic tiles on the top floor, as well as in the kitchen and bathrooms. It has air conditioning with heat pump in the master bedroom and attic. Domestic hot water and heating are supplied through individual oil-fired boiler. The house has all the necessary comforts for a family, with spacious and bright spaces. Each of the rooms is ideal for different needs, whether as bedrooms, offices, or playrooms. The 4 bathrooms, distributed in different areas of the house, ensure the comfort and convenience of all residents. The location of the house is excellent, in a quiet and well-connected area. Daganzo de Arriba is a charming town, surrounded by nature and with all the necessary services for day-to-day life (sports center, medical center, pharmacies, nurseries, schools, supermarkets, and a wide variety of restaurants). In addition, it is located just a few kilometers from Madrid, and only 10 minutes from Alcalá de Henares and Torrejón de Ardoz, which allows you to enjoy the tranquility of a rural environment without giving up the comforts of a large city. If you are truly looking for a home, do not miss the opportunity to see this property. Contact us for more information or to schedule a visit, even on weekends. ** NO FEES FOR BUYERS **' Return the translated ad to English in a utf8 JSON structure, serializable in javascript.

WE DO NOT CHARGE FEES TO THE BUYING PARTY! Fabulous corner villa for sale, with community pool and Padel courts. Access to the house is very comfortable, without stairs, which makes it easier for us to enter. The beautiful glass porch connects us to the ground floor, where we access a large independent living-dining room with air conditioning (hot-cold) and direct access. to the porch and garden. The garden is a large space in perfect condition, it has natural grass, a vegetable garden area, automatic irrigation and beautiful night lighting. On this floor, we also have a guest toilet and a large kitchen furnished with the main appliances (oven, hood and ceramic hob), it also has a glazed clothesline. On the first floor we find 3 bedrooms, all of them with built-in wardrobes and two full bathrooms. The master bedroom suite has a double walk-in closet and a built-in bathroom. The completely independent attic is perfectly equipped, has storage cabinets and two Velux-type windows, which guarantees natural light throughout the day. The entire house has PVC windows, stoneware and parquet floors in perfect condition, smooth paint, individual heating, alarm, etc. The house also has a surface garage for one vehicle. Unbeatable location, in the downtown area of Daganzo near the institute, schools, shops, playgrounds and health center. Bus stops a few meters away. Daganzo is located in one of the best areas of the Henares Corridor, just 15 minutes from the Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas airport and excellent communication with N-II-R2-M50 and A-1. Do not hesitate and contact us, we will inform you of all the details of this beautiful chalet. Great opportunity for your quality of life and with all the services at your fingertips. description: Spectacular 207m² villa built in 2008, ready to move into with 3 bedrooms and a 60m² garden. This house has the following distribution: Nice front patio of 30m² that gives us access to the house and the garage. Glazed porch, hall with armored door, closet under stairs and access to garage, large kitchen fully furnished and equipped with basic appliances. Bright 28m² living room from which we access the 60m² paved backyard with planters and a water intake. On this floor we have a bathroom equipped with a bathtub and screen. On the upper floor we find the 3 double bedrooms, all of them with a built-in wardrobe. The main one is a suite, with air conditioning, access to a 7m² terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. We have another bathroom with a bathtub and double sink for shared use. Closed attic, fully equipped and very bright thanks to its 3 Velux windows equipped with blackout blinds. Possibility of making a bathroom. In the garage on the ground floor we have enough space for 1 vehicle and it is equipped with a water connection to automatic doors. Excellent qualities: Smooth paint, in Florentine lands attic. Solid beech doors. Double aluminum windows with Climalit and mosquito nets. Heating throughout the house. Bars on the ground floor. Located in a very quiet area, but next to parks, town hall, post office, pharmacy, medical center and public transportation. Don't miss this opportunity and come visit it or call us for more information. WE DO NOT CHARGE FEES TO THE PURCHASING PARTY.

Great corner terraced house for sale with 190m² built and distributed over 4 floors. 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 1 toilet and garden with artificial grass and barbecue. Large garage with capacity for 3 vehicles and stoneware flooring. We enter the main floor, which has a furnished kitchen with a boiler room and sink, a separate living-dining room with a fireplace and direct access to the wood-covered back porch, and a hallway closet. We go up one floor and find 3 bedrooms, one of them a suite with a bathroom and 2 good-sized double bedrooms. In addition to having, one floor above, a very large attic with another bedroom and a bathroom, a living area with 2 solariums with views of the countryside. The house has qualities such as flooring throughout the house, white aluminum windows with double glazing and double windows, enclosures on the terrace and laundry room, garage at street level, lawn, etc. Located in an expansion area, with good connections and next to schools, parks, institutes, sports hall, swimming pool, etc. DON'T MISS THE OPPORTUNITY TO SEE THIS HOUSE! On the first floor, we find a spacious living room with a modern American kitchen, creating a cozy and contemporary atmosphere. In addition, you will find a bedroom with a built-in wardrobe, perfect for keeping everything organized, and a guest toilet for greater comfort. Don't forget the practical wardrobe in the hall, which adds a functional touch to the space. The second floor houses four charming bedrooms and two elegant bathrooms, one of them en suite for the main room. The latter not only offers a private retreat, but also features a walk-in closet that combines style and functionality. The quality of life is enhanced by the home's premium features, such as the double glazed PVC windows that allow abundant natural light, the parquet floors that add warmth and elegance, and the porcelain floors in the bathrooms and kitchen, that provide a touch of modernity. For your comfort, heating and hot water are supplied by an efficient natural gas boiler with a ducted air conditioning system. But the experience is not limited to the interior, since the urbanization completes the package with a community pool to enjoy sunny days, a playground for the little ones and a versatile multipurpose room. description: Semi-detached house with two floors and a fairly spacious and unrenovated attic, which is located in the upper part of the house. On the upper floor, there are 3 bedrooms and all of them with built-in wardrobes. The main one has a full bathroom and a 10 m² terrace. In the hallway on this floor, there is another bathroom with a bathtub and sink for shared use. The garage is located in the lower plaza, with access from the entrance hall, it has 2 very large parking spaces. Heating is communal and propane. The house is located in a very quiet area, with a community pool, green areas and very close to public transport services, town hall, medical center and pharmacy. The situation is unbeatable, it is a very good housing, location and investment opportunity. IN OUR AGENCY THE BUYING PARTY DOES NOT HAVE TO PAY ANY AMOUNT IN THE CONCEPT OF COMMISSION OR SIMILAR.

ICS OFFERS VILLA OPPORTUNITY IN UNBEATABLE AREA OF DAGANZO WITH GREAT QUALITIES AND TWO COMPLETELY RENOVATED ATTICS COMMON AREA WITH POOL AND GARDENS. Distribution of the property: Entrance porch with the possibility of enclosure. Low level: Hall, guest toilet in stairwell, built-in wardrobe, access to private 24m2 garage with entrance at street level, spacious and bright 30m2 living room with wood-burning fireplace, views and access to the garden, fully equipped kitchen and very bright with a bar area and stools. From here we can also access the 100m2 backyard with a porch, tiled flooring and garden areas (possibility of creating a private pool). Given its wide distribution, a bedroom could be made on the ground floor. SECOND FLOOR: We find 4 large, very bright bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, one of them with a bathroom and a private 14m2 terrace, another also has a private 4m2 terrace, a full bathroom in the hallway with a shower. THIRD FLOOR: Attic completely finished in two different rooms, a 25m2 room with the possibility of installing a bathroom since it has water and drainage connections, and another 10 m2 room, for a closet, storage or whatever use you want to give it; Solarium-type terrace of 28 m2. Very good qualities: Marble-type porcelain floor, park, double glazed windows, security doors, bars, wooden doors and cabinets, heating in all rooms. The chalet is located in a very quiet and familiar area, walking you can access supermarkets, bus stops, schools, institutes, tobacconist pharmacies, health center. House with unbeatable m2 price ratio. WE DO NOT CHARGE FEES TO THE BUYER WE HELP YOU WITH YOUR FINANCING WE HAVE OUR OWN REFORM COMPANY. Call and reserve your visit without obligation.

Villa Daganzo, 64, is a new development of 24 free-rent homes, located in the urban area on Constitución Street, 64, a 3-minute walk from City Hall. It has all the services, shopping area, schools, parks, restaurants, public transportation.. . The development consists of 1, 2 and 3 bedroom homes with ground floor apartments with gardens and penthouses with large terraces. All homes have a terrace, garage and storage room. It is a unique three-story building with a mixed façade composed of artificial stone slabs and/or exposed brick on the ground floor and SATE | ETICS in the rest of the building.

Propau Real Estate sells a fantastic semi-detached house with a communal pool in one of the best and central areas of Daganzo de Arriba. The 217m² chalet is distributed over 4 floors: The ground floor has a large, very bright living-dining room, with renovated floors. The living room gives direct access to the beautiful and well-kept garden with pergola and barbecue. The kitchen is furnished with appliances. There is also a large toilet and built-in wardrobe in the hall area. Access to the first floor is through the comfortable marble staircase, which leads to a large distributor of the 3 double bedrooms with built-in wardrobes fully lined on the inside and with drawers. The master bedroom suite has a separate dressing area, a full marble bathroom with a bathtub and a screen. A second bathroom, also complete, serves the rest of the bedrooms. The second floor is a charming attic whose current use is as an additional bedroom with two Velux-type windows, storage area and air conditioning with heat pump. All this makes this stay a very cozy space for the whole family. The basement is accessed directly from inside the house, it has a garage for 2 cars and a motorcycle/bike, as well as a large independent room, which can be used as a storage area, laundry room, etc.. . The house has a spacious front patio, with a glazed porch area that gives access to the house, with an armored door. The chalet has individual heating, air conditioning with heat pump in the attic, ceramic and wooden floors, Climalit windows, double windows with bars on the ground floor, oak doors inside. The urbanization has common areas such as a playground and community pool. Daganzo is located in one of the best areas of the Corredor del Henares, with public transport, schools, a medical center, shops (Alcampo, Mercadona), leisure areas and all the services at your fingertips. There are also several bus lines that connect with Alcalá de Henares (ALSA 252 and ALSA 254), Torrejón de Ardóz, Canillejas (ALSA 256) and night N204. Just 15 minutes from Adolfo Suarez Madrid Barajas International Airport and excellent communication with N-II-R2-M50 and A-1 Do not miss the opportunity to visit it without obligation!

WE DO NOT CHARGE FEES TO THE BUYING PARTY Beautiful duplex for sale with terrace in the center of Daganzo. It is in very good condition. Impressive semi-detached house, with a distribution over 4 floors and a total of 241m2 built, it is a true jewel that offers a comfortable and high-quality space.Let me describe its features in detail: Upon entering, you will be greeted by a very cozy patio that serves as a prelude to this magnificent home.From here, you access the main floor, where the hall is spacious and bright, which will make your guests feel comfortable from the first moment.On this floor, you will also find a courtesy toilet and the impressive kitchen of the house, which is well finished and equipped with high-quality elements to make the most of the available space.From the hall, there is also access to the spacious living room, a space in which everything flows harmoniously and which is ideal for resting, relaxing while watching television or enjoying reading.From here, you can go directly to the spectacular patio, which is the jewel of the house.This patio offers multiple possibilities, such as the installation of a swimming pool (either built-in or portable), a barbecue area or simply relaxing in the sun. On the first floor, there are the 3 bedrooms of the house and the main bathroom.The master bedroom is an impressive size with its own en-suite bathroom and a fantastic built-in wardrobe offering ample storage space.The other two bedrooms are also large in size and have fitted wardrobes, making them ideal spaces for children and adults alike. Going up to the attic, you will find a very well finished and versatile space that can be used according to your imagination and needs.It can become a game room, office, extra bedroom, gym or any other use you want thanks to its generous size. Last but not least, the garage of the house has interior access and has additional security measures.In addition, it has a space dedicated to laundry, which adds convenience to your daily routine. The house is made and finished with excellent qualities, including Kömmerling brand windows, known for being one of the best on the market in terms of insulation and energy efficiency.White lacquered interior doors add a touch of elegance, while high-quality wooden floors provide an attractive appearance and are easy to maintain. In summary, this semi-detached house is an exceptional property that combines comfort, high-quality design and a wide range of possibilities to customize it according to your needs.From its impressive patio to its versatile loft, this house is designed to be enjoyed from the first moment you step foot in it. DISCOVER THE GOOD LIFE: That of eating in your beautiful garden, that of having your grapes at hand, that of sunbathing and that of being able to enjoy your family without worrying that there are too many of them, because in this property you have enough space to celebrate every birthday and gathering with friends... Are you one of those who do not settle for anything? Then imagine living in this beautiful 3-story house, surrounded by nature, but close to: banks, pharmacies, supermarkets, parks, schools...This CORNER TOWNHOUSE is just 35 minutes from the center of Madrid, in a very quiet neighborhood with excellent neighbors.If you like what you read, I'll tell you more: The property is divided into 3 floors plus a basement; In the latter there is the diesel boiler, you also have space for the laundry and you can use it as a storage room. The first floor has the living area: the fully furnished and equipped kitchen, which also has a pantry; There is a toilet and the hall leads us to the open-plan living-dining room, which has a very charming fireplace, perfect for winter nights, and leads to a huge patio, with enough space to make a pool if you wish. On the second floor is the rest area: with 3 large bedrooms (each with a built-in wardrobe) and one of them in the form of a suite (its bathroom has a bathtub); There is also a full bathroom with a shower that the other two rooms share. The attic is spectacular, you can use it as a bedroom, as a study to work, as a library, whatever you prefer. In the front garden you can park the car, although it is not necessary to use that space of the house for this because it is very conveniently parked right in front of the property. Here you could take advantage and put a pergola, have your plants. The heating is diesel, as is the hot water, but the property has an electric water heater if you prefer to use it. Do you want to visit it? Can you imagine living in a natural environment, peacefully reading a book in your garden or celebrating outdoor parties? Do not hesitate to meet her, contact us and you will not regret it.
